page.title: 18THE ARTS
page.content: The arts are well served in Cirencester with many opportunities locally to either participate or spectate.The old brewery in the centre of town has been converted into an Arts Centre known as the{Cirencester {Workshops.}Nearby is the{Niccol Centre which is open all day. It is for old people to do their hobbies and enjoy the day.The age range is 55 and over. More women than men go to classes.The most popular classes, in order, are woodwork,painting,stone carving, clay modelling,drawing and design, calligraphy, cookery and batik.They also have a theatre and exhibitions. There are lots of work shops to do these things in.Some people volunteer to help since they are too young to do classes. You can also buy tickets for plays and concerts which are held in the theatre.
